EmailTemplate.name: Pocketflow Login details username
EmailTemplate.subject: Pocketflow login details
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Welcome to PocketFlow
Hi <name>,
Thank you for signing up to PocketFlow, where spend analytics and demographic trends of your customers is one click away.
Your username is <username>
Your password is <password>
Copy this link into Chrome to access PocketFlow
If you have any questions, contact the support team on 011 895 6818 or send an e-mail to PocketFlow@absa.co.za
Regards
PocketFlow
